params.name:
# List of source URLs from AI responses
        brand_name

fields.name: target
fields.type: str  # 目标对象（如网站URL、负面内容等）

fields.name: context
fields.type: str  # The surrounding text where the brand was mentioned

fields.name: sentiment_score
fields.type: float  # Sentiment associated with the mention (-1 to 1)

fields.name: source_indicators
fields.type: List[str]  # Indicators of where the info might come from

fields.name: market_share_distribution
fields.type: Dict[str, float]  # Brand name to percentage

fields.name: recommendation_weights
fields.type: Dict[str, float]  # Brand name to recommendation weight

fields.name: competitor_intelligence
fields.type: Dict[str, Any]  # Detailed info about competitors

fields.name: summary_insights
fields.type: List[str]  # Key insights from the analysis

fields.name: error_type
fields.type: Optional[AIErrorType] = None # 新增错误类型字段

fields.name: sources
fields.type: List[str]  # Reference links/sources mentioned in the response

fields.name: usage
fields.type: Dict[str, int]  # Token usage information (input_tokens, output_tokens, total_tokens)

fields.name: latency
fields.type: float  # Time taken to generate response in seconds

fields.name: success
fields.type: bool  # Whether the request was successful

fields.name: error_message
fields.type: Optional[str] = None  # Error message if request failed

fields.name: provider
fields.type: str = ""  # Name of the AI provider

fields.name: model
fields.type: str = ""  # Model name that generated the response

fields.name: metadata
fields.type: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None  # Additional metadata specific to the provider
